summary: Adds new lore friendly books to Skyrim!!!
descriptionHtml: This mod aims to add many new lore friendly books to the world of Skyrim. Currently, I've only added two books, and am uploading this just to see how much traction this mod gets. The two books and their locations are:The History of Tamriel I <- In Sleeping Giant Inn in RiverWoodThe History of Tamriel II <- In The Drunken Huntsman in WhiterunThanks for the interest and be sure to check back for future updates, and more knowledge. :)
author: AlexWeth96
